description: “It’s been a minute since we’ve done this,” says Todd Kenreck in Dungeons & Dragon’s latest YouTube video, “but we have a new Unearthed Arcana.” Sitting across from him is a smiling Jeremy Crawford, D&D’s lead rules designer, who says he is “so glad that the first Unearthed Arcana after the new Player’s Handbook and the new Du
title: This fan favorite class is getting D&D 2024’s first playtest

description: It’s a tumultuous time to be a Helldiver. Not only are the cowardly Illuminate back after a century-long disappearance, but they’re kidnapping Super Earth citizens and turning them into horrifying monsters known as the Voteless. This doesn’t even begin to cover the schemes of the other two factions: the Automatons, who are creeping closer towards Super Earth, and the Terminids, who are generating tons of mysterious, evolution-inspiring spores. But the worst part of all is that, well, I’m pretty sure we can’t trust anything Super Earth is telling us. I think they may be telling a couple of fibs.
title: Fellow Helldrivers 2 players, I think Super Earth might be fibbing about the Illuminate

description:
If you know someone who unironically loves A24 as much as comedian Carmen Christopher ironically does, there’s a membership out there that’d make for an amazing gift. AAA24 is a $99 per year club that delivers perks upon perks. To name a few: they’ll get a ticket to every A24 movie on opening weekend at several U.S. theaters, a quarterly zine, plus a free gift on the member’s birthday (one Polygon staffer says the gift they were sent was worth more than the price of the membership).

Given the production company’s large output of goo
title: The AAA24 membership is a great gift idea for movie lovers

description: Over 400,000 people are clicking monsters and picking up loot in Path of Exile 2 right now, according to Steam’s most played list. That also means that there are thousands of people getting torn apart by those monsters and wondering how they found themselves playing the Dark Souls of loot-based action RPGs. Developer Grinding Gear Games doesn’t seem bothered by the number
title: Path of Exile 2’s last patch of the year makes its brutal difficulty significantly less frustrating

description: On Dec. 16, Wizards of the Coast released the updated banned and restricted announcement, sharing which Magic: The Gathering cards are no longer allowed in competitive play – along with a few cards that they’re bringing back into the fold. While there was a ban announcement for MTG: Arena in late October, this is the first update to competitive play since two m
title: MTG bans – and unbans – some extremely potent cards to end a rocky year

description:
The Master League in Pokémon Go’s Go Battle League features the best of the best, thanks to its lack of CP cap — meaning titans of the Pokédex lock heads in heated battles, and only the very best trainers stand to reach the top of the rankings. 

Whether you’re looking to introduce your Pokémon to battling for the first time, or simply want some tips for the current Master League meta, we’re breaking down the top threats in the Master League and which Pokémon to add to your team with this full guide.
title: Best Master League teams to use in Pokémon Go

description:
The Holiday Cup: Little Edition is a limited-time cup that celebrates the winter holidays in the Pokémon Go Battle League. With a small selection of eligible Pokémon types and a very low CP limit to adhere to, it’s going to require some careful planning and a bit of luck to put together the best team possible.

You can compete in the Holiday Cup: Little Edition from Dec. 17 to Dec. 24, 2024. It will then return from Dec. 31, 2024, to Jan. 7, 2025. With a total of two weeks to take part, it’s worth investing some reso
title: Best team for the Holiday Cup: Little Edition in Pokémon Go

description:
If you’re looking to level up your crafters and gatherers in Final Fantasy 14, completing weekly custom deliveries to eager clients is a great way to amass both EXP and scrips (the crafting/gathering currency).

Below, we explain how custom deliveries work in FFXIV and how to unlock them all.

Custom deliveries in FFXIV, explained

Custom deliveries are
title: Where to unlock all custom deliveries in FFXIV

description:
Pixar’s upcoming animated show will no longer include a transgender storyline, according to The Hollywood Reporter. This comes on the heels of Disney pulling an episode of Marvel’s Moon Girl and Devil Dinosaur, which also included a trans storyline. 

A representative for Disney told the Hollywood Reporter that, “When it comes to animated content for a y
title: Disney pulls transgender storyline from Pixar’s new show

description: Games Workshop maintains lots of different product lines. There’s Warhammer 40,000, of course, but also its many spinoffs like Necromunda, Kill Team, and Legions Imperialis just to name a few. With all those little figures clamoring for attention, it can be hard for every product line to get i
title: War of the Rohirrim starter set doesn’t include LotR film’s main character

description: Jon M. Chu’s hit movie version of the Broadway musical Wicked (or more accurately, Wicked: Part I) has prompted a new wave of enthusiastically shipping frenemy protagonists Elphaba and Galinda/Glinda under the ship name “Gelphie.” That fandom has been present in Broadway circles since the stage show’s 2003 debut, and no wonder — Wicked</
title: Wicked’s author, stars, and fans agree: Elphaba and Glinda are lovers

description:
Step aside Pikachu, it’s time for the mystical time-traveling Pokémon, Celebi to step into the spotlight as the new go-to card in Pokémon Trading Card Game Pocket.

Released in November 2024, Pokémon TCG Pocket is a mobile game where players can assemble a digital collection of Pokémon cards and battle with them. The developers released the game’s first expansion called “
title: Celebi ex is the new boss of Pokémon TCG Pocket

description:
Pack Points are your way of tilting the odds in Pokémon TCG Pocket. When the gacha gods refuse to award you that Kangaskhan you’re pulling for, pack points allow you to simply buy it (or, y’know, any card you’re aiming for).

Here’s how to get pack points in Pokémon TCG Pocket, alongside some explanation of how they work in the wake of the Mythical Island expansion.

How to get pack points in Pokémon TCG Pocket
title: Do pack points carry over between expansions in Pokémon TCG Pocket?

description:
For many people, reading the rules to complicated board games can already feel like reading an alien language. City of Six Moons takes that one step further. A game about the development of an alien civilization, the rulebook itself (which was “discovered by” Amabel Holland) is written entirely in symbols and icons. You, the player, will need to decipher the rules before you can even get to play — though, in Holland’s eyes, the translation is part of the game itself. 

City of Six Moons was inspired by Holland’s experience translating a German board game she found at a
title: The alien board game people are spending months translating

description: As promised, Blizzard Entertainment is giving 6v6 team comps another shot in Overwatch 2 with a new limited-time experimental mode for its hero shooter. The 6v6 Role Queue experiment will bring back the two-tank, two-damage, two-support team structure from the original Overwatch for three weeks, as well as some big changes, particularly for tanks. Say goodbye to Roadhog’s Pig Pen
title: Overwatch 2’s 6v6 experiment is here with some major balance changes

description:
The new Mythical Island cards are out now in Pokémon TCG Pocket.

With the release of the Mythical Island expansion, 86 new cards have been added to Pokémon TCG Pocket for you to collect and battle with. Each card comes with its own unique artwork and attack (and, in some case, ability). Although this set isn’t as big as the three booster packs in the launch-day Genetic Apex expansion, there are still a ton of cards to earn and learn.

Below, we’ve created a table outlining all the
title: All new Mythical Island cards in Pokémon TCG Pocket

description:
Katsuhiro Harada, who handles all things Tekken at Bandai Namco, sounds interested in a potential crossover with the gritty take on Pac-Man seen in the sixth episode of Amazon series Secret Level and used as the basis of the upcoming Shadow Labyrinth.

“The game environment would be a good crossover for Tekken, atmosphere-wise,” Harada told IGN when asked
title: Tekken producer says weird, new Pac-Man would make for a ‘good crossover’

description:
Pokémon Go is kicking off the festive season with part one of its yearly holiday event from Dec. 17-22 — called, suitably, “Holiday Part 1.”

The event also features two pretty good bonuses: doubled XP from catching Pokémon and halved hatch distance for eggs put into incubators during the event. Shiny Sandygast also makes its debut during this event, alongside a special Dedenne in a holiday outfit.

Below we list all the perks and bonuses for Pokémon Go’s “Holiday Part 1” 2024 event.
title: Pokémon Go ‘Holiday Part 1’ 2024 event guide

description:
It was only a matter of time until the Skibidi Toilet cinematic universe was introduced to Fortnite.

The phrase “Skibidi Toilet” has become synonymous with people who spend too much time on the internet. It’s a popular meme and associated with the online humor and meme tastes of Gen Alpha. But it’s not just a gag. It’s a whole dang animated show with its own universe of characters. The Skibidi Toilet YouTube channel has more than 183 of episodes in the saga and mo
title: Skibidi Toilet and Plungerman are coming to Fortnite

description:
Like many other hardcore Disney fans, when I heard Disney was making a Mufasa-centered prequel to the 2019 photorealistic CG remake of The Lion King, I immediately thought: But what about the existing prequel, 1998’s The Lion King II: Simba’s Pride? 

From the
title: Mufasa would’ve been a banger DTV prequel, but on the big screen, it’s a dud

description:
James Wan, the prolific filmmaker known for creating the Saw, Insidious, and Conjuring franchises, recently bought the rights to adapt 2024 survival road trip game Pacific Drive into a TV series, Variety reports.

While the show has yet to find a home, Wan will executive produce the series alongside the president of his Atomic Monster production company Michael Clear (Mortal Kombat, M3GAN) and head of television Rob Hackett (Swamp Thing, Archive 81
title: James Wan is making a Pacific Drive TV show

description:
Some people bash their heads against difficult games for glory or for loot, but I’m just trying to survive Awaria so I can kiss another ghost. Łukasz “Vanripper” Piskorz, the developer behind cult hit Helltaker, is back with more cute girls to dangle in front of you in a game designed to make you work for it.

Awaria is free on Steam and Itch.io, but scoring a smooch from one of its ghost girls is certainly no
title: Kissing ghosts is hard work in the Helltaker dev’s new free game on Steam

description: Wizards of the Coast’s attempt to revive the beloved Dark Alliance brand of hack-and-slash Dungeons & Dragons games is coming to the ends of its life. Dungeons & Dragons: Dark Alliance, released in 2021 to middling reviews, will go offline and be removed from sale on Feb. 24, 2025, the publisher announced in a notice posted to digital
title: Dungeons & Dragons: Dark Alliance being pulled from stores, bringing an end to a botched revival

description:
Earth Sprites are one of the many sprites added to Fortnite in Chapter 6 Season 1.

For one of the Week 1 quests, you’ve been tasked with giving an Earth Sprite a weapon. When you interact with an Earth Sprite, you’re able to trade a weapon and receive legendary one in return. The only problem is there are 22 Earth Sprite location,s and only two of them spawn per game.

Here’s where you can find all of the Earth Sprite
title: All Earth Sprite locations in Fortnite

description:
Specialists are hireable NPC’s found around the map in Fortnite.

There are four specialists in Fortnite Chapter 6 Season 1: heavy, medic, scout, and supply. Each specialist has their own abilities and uses, but you only need to hire one to complete this Week 2 quest… hopefully. In Week 2, you’ll need to hire a specialist and collect 50 ammo, but the specialists can be a little difficult to find.

Here’s where to find every specialist in Fortnite Chapter 6 Season 1.
title: All specialist locations in Fortnite Chapter 6 Season 1

description: Easily the strangest facet of Prime Video’s Secret Level series is a short film based on Sony’s Concord, the first-person shooter that launched this summer to a dismal reception, and was quickly taken offline and canceled. Concord was a spectacular failure for Sony and developer
title: Concord’s Secret Level episode is the best trailer for the game

description:
Did you know that some of the voice actors from the original Resident Evil didn’t even know they were in the final game? I sure didn’t, until I read Philip J Reed’s oral history on the development of Resident Evil published by Boss Fight Books.

The video games we know and love have rich history behind them, and Boss Fight Books are a window into their creation, uncovering the ways that they impacted the gaming industry. If you’d like to learn more about the making of Resident Evil and 32 other classic games — each with their own PDF and ePUB book — you can currently pick up a huge library of oral histories by the publis
title: Learn more about your favorite games over the holidays with this $18 Boss Fight Book bundle

description: If The Outer Worlds could be summed up in three words, I’d go with “capitalism is bad.” That message is dressed up with silly mascot costumes, over-the-top advertising, and cheeky dialogue, but once you scratch at that silliness, the satire becomes quite clear. The Secret Level animated anthology spends one episode in this world, following an illiterate trash orphan named Amos as he tries to scrape
title: Secret Level’s Outer Worlds episode is missing a key part of the game

description:
Bluey, the kid-friendly series that has made a name of itself by wrecking adults with stories of family, friends, and little life moments, is getting the movie treatment from Disney.

The Australian animated series, which is globally distributed by the BBC, became a sensation in the U.S. after a streaming deal brought it to Disney Plus in 2020. Since that debut, Bluey’s regularly been in the top 10 most streamed programs across all platforms, leading to a merchandise bonanza, an
title: Bluey fever to continue with a movie

description:
Slugma, the lava Pokémon from Johto, can be found in the wild in Pokémon Go. Yes, Slugma can be shiny in Pokémon Go!

You won’t see neither Slugma nor Magcargo get any use in PvP or PvE content, but it’s a pretty good shiny! It’ll be a hard decision whether or not to evolve
title: Can Slugma be shiny in Pokémon Go?
